songs.title: 1 by 1
songs.lyrics:
it goes by a 1 by 1 even 2 by 2 everybody on the floor.let me show you how we do.lets go dip it low then bring it up slow. wind it up 1 time wind it back once more.run run run run everybody move run lemme see you move and rock it til the grooves done.shake it til the moon becomes sun(sun).everybody in the club give me a run (run).if you ready to move say it.(yeah) one time for your minds say it.(yeah yeah). well i`m ready for ya.come let me show ya. you want to groove im`a show you hot to move come come.

hey mr. please mr.Dj tell me if you can hear me. turn the music up.

it goes 1 by 1 even 2 by 2 everybody in the club gon be rockin when im through let bass from the speakers run through ya sneakers move both ya feet and run to the beat

run run run ru  everybody move run lemme see you move and rock it til. the moons sun(sun). everybody in the club give me a run(run).if you ready to move say it(yeah). one time for your minds say it ( yeah yeah).well im ready for ya come let me show ya.you want to groove im`a show you to move come come

hey mr. please mr.Dj Tell me if you hear me.Turn the music up
